    • Uses of Move in fko.chessly.player

      Methods in fko.chessly.player that return Move 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Move Player.getMove()
      Implementation of getMove() for to determine the next move
      Move HumanPlayer.getMove()
      Implementation of getMove() to determine the next move.
      Move ComputerPlayer.getMove()
      Implementation of getMove() for to determine th next move
      Move Player.getNextMove(Board board)
      return next move
      Move AbstractPlayer.getNextMove(Board board)
      Return next move by waiting for a move given by the player thread in run().
      This is usually called from a game object when it is this player's turn.
      It sets the player's status to Player.THINKING and waits for a move (Player.HAS_MOVE) through calling waitForState(Player.HAS_MOVE).
      Methods in fko.chessly.player with parameters of type Move 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
